channel.title: Admins privlages plz help!
channel.description:
Hey guys ok i need help what to search in my client java...
Ok 1st i wunnu know how to give admin+ unlimited special attack
2nd i want to know how to give admin+ a way so when they DIE they dont lsoe any items
3rd i want to know how to give admin+ commands

item.title: Admins privlages plz help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

1st 1… u need to either change all ur commands… or u can just put something in proces to make it if ur an admin, it refills ur spec every .5 seconds… on delta it saves ur special amount on char file, theres a comand that sets it 2 a really high number… u can do that if u want
for making it never lower tho… put this in process()

if (playerRights >= 2) {
specialAmount == 100;
}

2nd… i have this on my server, just make it delte the items if player rights are under 2…
if (playerRights <= 1) {
apply death stuff
}

it will only make nubs lsoe there stuff

3rd… admin commands wuld b like
if (comand.strtsWith(“amg123”) && playerRights >= 2) {
sendMesg(“amg u did it! HCKOR!”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Admins privlages plz help!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

ok bascially easy…

if your using delta then the commands will be different to normal ones.

you will need to make a command that will give you full spec which is 100.

  1. im not sure with delta, but just search on google.

  2. use the operaters “==”">=" there are alot more but i cannot be boved telling you.

you can also search “java operaters” and it will give you a list.

Read full topic
